options.title: -a, --all
options.description: convert all blanks, instead of just initial blanks

options.title: -a, --all
options.description: convert all blanks, instead of just initial blanks

options.title: --first-only
options.description: convert only leading sequences of blanks (overrides -a)

options.title: -t, --tabs=N
options.description: have tabs N characters apart instead of 8 (enables -a)
